introduction.title: Hi there! Welcome
introduction.text: I'm a Full Stack Developer and Analytics Engineer. Passionate about delivering seamless user experiences and building data-driven web solutions. Have a look at my works and if you have any query, feel free to reach out!

about_me.intro: Passionate Full Stack Developer and Analytics Engineer, with a strong interest in implementing modern web experiences and working with data. With a technical background in web development and a data-oriented mindset, I enjoy working at the intersection of code and data collection. I began my journey as a self-taught learner through online resources, and in 2023 I decided to formalize my studies. Iâ€™m currently working as an Analytics Engineer at VML The Cocktail, where I focus on implementing web tracking, structuring events, and ensuring reliable and useful data collection for analysts and business teams. I value technical challenges, continuous learning, and the opportunity to create impact through well-crafted solutions. Take a look at my skills.
